tuv.seg: The Taoiseach is the head of the Government
Tá an Taoiseach i gceannas ar an Rialtas
He or she is nominated by the Dáil (one of the Irish houses of Parliament) and is appointed by the President
Ainmníonn an Dáil í nó é agus déanann an tUachtarán Taoiseach dí nó de
The Taoiseach then nominates the other members of the Government
Ainmníonn an Taoiseach, ansin, baill eile den Rialtas
They are approved by the Dáil and appointed by the President
Faigheann siad seo tacaíocht na Dála agus glacann an tUachtarán leis an gceapáchán
He may dismiss them if there is sufficient reason to do so
Is féidir leis nó léi iad a chuir as a bpost má tá cúis aige nó aici sin a dhéanamh
You can read this information on the current Taoiseach
Ta eolas ar an Taoiseach láithreach anseo
The Taoiseach acts as a channel of communication between the Government and the President
Bíonn an Taoiseach idir an tUachtarán agus an Rialtas i gcúrsaí cumarsáide
He or she advises the President about summoning and dissolving the Dáil
Cuireann sé nó sí comhairle ar an Uachtarán maidir leis an Dáil a lánscoir nó glaoch ar an Dáil
He or she presents Bills (or proposals for legislation) to the President for signature so that they can become Acts with legal effect
Cuireann sé nó sí Billí ós comhair an Uachtaráin le bheith sínithe ionas go ndéantar Acht díobh agus gur féidir iad a chur i bhfeidhm
The Taoiseach also keeps the President generally informed on domestic and international policy matters
Coiméadann an Taoiseach an tUachtarán ar an eolas faoi pholasaithe náisiúnta agus idirnáisiúnta an Rialtais
As the leading public figure in the Government, the Taoiseach also acts as a spokesperson for the Government on major policy issues and chairs Cabinet meetings
Labhraíonn an Taoiseach thar cheann an Rialtais ar aon ní a bhaineann le polasaí. Déanann an Taoiseach cathaoirleacht ar chruinnithe Comh-Aireachta
He or she takes an interest in the affairs of all the Departments of State and ensures that the plans of departments are co-ordinated
Bíonn súil á choiméad aige nó aici ar gach Roinn Stáit agus déanann cinnte de go bhfuil na Ranna éagsúla ar chomh intinn maidir le pléanáil de
He or she makes sure that Cabinet decisions are carried out by the ministers and that the ministers fully understand the implications of different Government policies
Cinntíonn sé nó sí go gcuireann na hAirí i bhfeidhm na cinnithe atá tógtha ag an gComh-Aireacht agus go dtuigeann siad na himpleachtaí a bhaineann le polasaithe an Rialtais
The Taoiseach also has a major role to play in our relations with foreign countries
Tá plé mhór ag an Taoiseach, freisin, lenar dteangbháil le tíortha eile
He or she represents Ireland abroad and regularly meets with the other heads of state of the European Union to help shape European policy
Déanann sé nó sí ionadaíocht dúinn thar lear agus bualann go rialta le ceannairí na dtíortha eile san Aontas Eorpach chun polasaithe na hEorpa a phlé
The Taoiseach and all the ministers collectively are answerable to Dáil Eireann
Tá an Taoiseach agus na hAirí go léir freagrach do Dháil Éireann
The Taoiseach is assisted in his or her duties by the Government Chief Whip
Tugann an Priomhaoire Rialtais cúnamh don Taoiseach ina chuid nó ina cuid dualgas
